page.title: 19VILLAGE LIFE
page.content: In Albrighton people are always raising money for charities.Coffee Mornings and Buffet lunches seem to be the favourite.The funniest item in the fund raising is the pram race which takes place every Boxing Day.In this the men dress up as babies and are pushed around the village by their wives.They stop off at each pub and have half a pint of beer.All that's made goes to Action Research.Also each year in the village we have an Arts Festival,where people young or old make some piece of artwork to be exhibited.It can also be purchased. Every year at the church we have a music and flower festival where people play their music for other people to listen too.This is very enjoyable.
